In this video, I explain the Purpose framework — my macro systematic investing approach and the philosophy behind it.

WHAT PURPOSE MEANS

Purpose is investing with clarity

and living with intention —

the discipline to build wealth and life

by design, not by chance.

The Two Pillars of Purpose

Purpose as a System

Purpose is my macro systematic investing framework — a structured, data-driven way to navigate the world with clarity, conviction, and institutional discipline.

Purpose as a Way of Living

Purpose is also a philosophy for life — intention over impulse, design over randomness, growth over distraction. It's the mindset behind every choice, every risk, and every step forward.

ABOUT MIKE

Mike Villalobos

Macro Systematic Investor | Market Strategist | Founder of AtarionX

Economist, market strategist, and macro systematic investor with experience in hedge-fund research, private investment advisory, and university-level instruction.

Former Equities Trader, Portfolio Manager, and Head of Investment Strategies — developing systematic equity frameworks with a disciplined, data-driven approach.

Today, he leads AtarionX — a research and software firm helping investors make decisions grounded in macro data and institutional-grade discipline.

Recognized among top global performers in the Global Bloomberg Trading Challenge.
